actions.name: Actions
actions.description: Spawn: At the start of its Turn, roll d4. On a roll of 2 to 4, this Being spawns an Ally Being (d6, roll two and take the highest if this Being is at half HP or lower), which appears in the nearest open space: 1 Giant Spider (p. 132) 2 Basilisk (p. 135) 3 Owl Bear (p. 145) 4 Rust Monster (p. 148) 5 Warp Beast (p. 151) 6 Gelatinous Cube (p. 172)
